ref: 6511 dŕ̊ti m. ʻ skin of leather, leather bag, hide, bellows ʼ RV. &rcirclemacr Pk. dii -- , daï -- f. ʻ waterskin ʼ; Dm. drī ʻ inflated goatskin ʼ; Gaw. lyärī ʻ skin bag ʼ; Kal.urt. dril ʻ inflated goatskin ʼ < *drir, rumb. driu, obl. drīlūna, Kho. dril (→ Phal. drhil NOPhal 34); K. dryūru, drūru, drūlu m. ʻ skin of men or animals ʼ (*drid -- > *drir -- before loss of -- d -- in other surroundings?); P.kgr. daraī˜ m. ʻ inflated buffalo -- skin used as a float ʼ; B. daṛĭ̄ ʻ sinew, tendon, cord, string ʼ, daṛā ʻ rope ʼ; -- ext. -- ḍ -- : OG. daïḍaü ʻ leather ball ʼ, G. deṛɔ m. -- K. dĕl m. ʻ skin (of body), rind, husk ʼ?
